identity.name: E1 Enterprise ERP
identity.archetype: Swiss & High-Contrast (Archetype 4) mixed with Performance Pro (Archetype 2)
principles: Density is clarity: Show more data, but organize it perfectly.
Color is status: Use color only to signal state (Paid, Late, Processing).
Type is structure: Use font weight and mono fonts to create hierarchy.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium text-sm transition-all shadow-sm active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium text-sm transition-all shadow-sm
buttons.ghost: bg-transparent hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 rounded-md px-3 py-2 text-sm

inputs.default: flex h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-slate-900 focus-visible:ring-offset-1 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

cards.base: rounded-lg border border-slate-200 bg-white text-slate-950 shadow-sm

tables.header: bg-slate-50 border-b border-slate-200 px-4 py-2 text-left text-xs font-semibold text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wider
tables.cell_num: p-2 align-middle text-sm text-slate-700 font-mono text-right

images.usage: Full screen background for /login route with dark overlay

phases.name: Phase 3: Operational Flow
tasks: Order Management (Status Workflow: Typed -> Implanted -> Attended)

do_not: DO NOT use gradients for text.
DO NOT center align data tables.
DO NOT use generic rounded-xl everywhere; use rounded-md for enterprise feel.
must: MUST use 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial values and ID codes.
MUST right-align all monetary and numerical columns.
MUST use defined Status Colors for visual feedback.
MUST include data-testid on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-density, high-performance ERP. Prioritize speed and density over whitespace. Follow the 'Swiss Grid' philosophy: distinct lines, clear hierarchy, no fluff. Use the provided image for the Login screen only. All other screens should be clean, data-heavy interfaces. Use 'recharts' for the Commission Cockpit.
